title: Hospitality Practical Competencies Enhancement: Mathematical Analysis Instruction Utilizing Industrial Heritage and Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects

learning_goals: Learners can analyze industrial heritage cases through digital storytelling animations to explain spatiotemporal contexts.
Learners can derive correlations between mining data and steel production quantities through regression analysis.
Learners can visualize historical trends of industrial heritage as time-series graphs and perform mathematical predictions.
